items.title: Children among 25 killed in one of Russia's deadliest strikes on western Ukraine
items.description: Two blocks of flats were attacked in the western city of Ternopil. One was almost destroyed.

items.title: Supreme Court rules Christian-focused RE taught in NI schools is unlawful
items.description: The Christian RE taught in schools in Northern Ireland is unlawful, the UK Supreme Court has ruled.

items.title: Serial rapist and former police officer David Carrick guilty of more sex offences
items.description: David Carrick is already serving a life sentence for 71 offences of sexual violence.

items.title: Australia cap Hughes called up by Wales
items.description: Wales call up Melbourne City midfielder Laura Hughes, who has been capped by Australia, for their international camp in Spain.

items.title: Russian spy ship pointed lasers at RAF pilots tracking it, says defence secretary
items.description: John Healey says he has updated the Navy's rules for tracking the vessel after the "dangerous" move.
